item.title: Algebra | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Who should join? This class is ideal for students who are generally doing well in their algebra class but: Find some homework problems particularly difficult.Want to explore algebraic concepts in greater depth.Are looking for a challenge beyond their regular coursework.
